verses.verse: A Song; a Psalm of the sons of Korah. Great<WH1419> is Jehovah<WH3068>, and greatly<WH3966> to be praised<WH1984>, In the city<WH5892> of our God<WH430>, in his holy<WH6944> mountain<WH2022>.

Beautiful <WH3303> in elevation<WH5131>, the joy<WH4885> of the whole earth<WH776>, Is mount<WH2022> Zion<WH6726>, on the sides<WH3411> of the north<WH6828>, The city<WH7151> of the great<WH7227> King<WH4428>.
God <WH430> hath made himself known<WH3045> in her palaces<WH759> for a refuge<WH4869>.
For <WH4428>, lo, the kings assembled<WH3259> themselves<WH5674>, They passed by together<WH3162>.
They saw<WH7200> it<WH8539>, then were they amazed; They were dismayed<WH926>, they hasted away<WH2648>.
Trembling <WH7461> took hold<WH270> of them there<WH2427>, Pain, as of a woman in travail<WH2427>.
With the east<WH6921> wind<WH7307> Thou breakest<WH7665> the ships<WH591> of Tarshish<WH8659>.

As we have heard<WH8085>, so have we seen<WH7200> In the city<WH5892> of Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, in the city<WH5892> of our God<WH430>: God<WH430> will establish<WH3559> it for<WH5704> ever<WH5769>. <WH5542>[[Selah
We have thought<WH1819> on thy lovingkindness<WH2617>, O God<WH430>, In the midst<WH7130> of thy temple<WH1964>.
As is thy name<WH8034>, O God<WH430>, So is thy praise<WH8416> unto the ends<WH7099> of the earth<WH776>: Thy right hand<WH3225> is full<WH4390> of righteousness<WH6664>.
Let mount<WH2022> Zion<WH6726> be glad<WH1523>, Let the daughters<WH1323> of Judah<WH3063> rejoice<WH1523>, Because of thy judgments<WH4941>.
Walk about<WH5437> Zion<WH6726>, and go round about<WH5362> her<WH5608>; Number the towers thereof<WH4026>;
480 <WH7896> ye well<WH3820> her bulwarks<WH2430>; Consider<WH6448> her palaces<WH759>: That ye may tell<WH5608> it to the generation<WH1755> following<WH314>.
For this God<WH430> is our God<WH430> for ever<WH5769> and ever<WH5703>: He will be our guide<WH5090> even unto death<WH4192>.
